title: Even with more important things on his mind, Nick Nurse misses his Toronto Raptors team - TSN
description: Even with more important things on his mind, Nick Nurse misses his Toronto Raptors team TSN Raptors’ Nick Nurse gets rare chance to catch breath during shutdown Sportsnet.ca Nick Nurse stays in touch with Raptors players, daily video calls with 'NBA family' T…
content: TORONTO Over the last couple of weeks Canadas sports networks have teamed up to give Toronto Raptors fans an opportunity to relive last springs historic championship run Its been a fun and necessary distraction in dark and uncertain circumstances especially chars
